name: Modelo especial
description:
Handcrafted with all-natural ingredients, Modelo Especial has built a solid reputation as a classic, thirst-quenching beer. The brand represents the can-package of Grupo Modelo's portfolio and is also available in non-returnable bottles.

Modelo Especial is a must for those looking to capture the flavor of Mexico. Modelo Especial has 145 calories per 12 ounce serving.
